title: Camelot
creator_credit: Joshua Logan, Jack L. Warner and Warner Bros Pictures
brief_description: Adapted from the very successful Broadway show, “Camelot” features songs from the renowned songwriting team of Lerner and Loewe. Starring Richard Harris, Vanessa Redgrave, Franco Nero, David Hemmings and Lionel Jeffries, it tells of the tragic romantic triangle between Arthur, Guinevere and Sir Lancelot.
